summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Connections Module deployment. Backend APIs are 100% functional with all required endpoints working. Frontend pages load and function correctly with proper UI interactions. Mock data generation works as designed. External preview URL is unavailable but local deployment is fully operational.

integration_issues.issue: External URL https://svetlana-connect-1j0v.preview.emergentagent.com shows 'Preview Unavailable' - agent resting after inactivity
WebSocket connections failing to external URL (expected due to preview unavailability)

passed_tests: Backend health check /api/health returns ok:true - ✅
Connections health /api/connections/health returns ok:true, module:connections - ✅
Mock score endpoint /api/connections/score/mock returns scoring data - ✅
Trends API /api/connections/trends/mock returns correct trend states - ✅
Early Signal API /api/connections/early-signal/mock returns badge detection - ✅
Admin auth POST /api/admin/auth/login with admin/admin12345 returns token - ✅
Admin connections overview GET /api/admin/connections/overview loads < 2 sec (0.06s) - ✅
Admin config tab shows read-only configs - ✅
Admin stability tab shows score ≥ 0.9 (shows 100%) - ✅
Admin alerts batch generates alerts (4 alerts generated) - ✅
Cooldown deduplication works correctly - ✅
Frontend /connections page loads with proper UI elements - ✅
Frontend /connections/radar Early Signal Radar loads with chart - ✅
Search input functionality works - ✅
Filters button and panel functionality works - ✅
Compare button available and functional - ✅
View toggle (Radar/Table) switches work correctly - ✅
Profile filter buttons (Retail, Influencer, Whale) work - ✅
Signal filter buttons (Breakout, Rising) work - ✅
Radar SVG chart displays with data points (9 points) - ✅
Stats display shows breakout/rising counts - ✅
Mock data generation creates test accounts - ✅
Alpha Zone highlighting in radar works - ✅
Legend display in radar works - ✅
action_item_for_main_agent: External preview URL is unavailable (agent resting), but all local functionality works perfectly. All required endpoints from the review request are functional. Consider reactivating the preview URL if external access is needed, otherwise the deployment is complete and operational.

success_percentage.backend: 100% - All required endpoints working: health checks, connections APIs, admin authentication, mock data generation
success_percentage.frontend: 95% - All UI functionality works locally. Only external preview URL unavailable due to agent inactivity
